title: Noir & Crimson Contrast Knit Tee
description: Command attention without saying a word. Our Noir & Crimson Contrast Knit Tee is engineered for the man who refuses to blend in. The jet-black body delivers a clean, powerful silhouette, while the bold crimson shoulder panels and ribbed neckline inject a confident edge that elevates this far beyond your ordinary tee. Crafted from our signature superfine merino-cotton blend, this knit tee drapes with a refined weight that feels effortlessly premium against the skin. The precision-cut contrast panelling draws the eye across the shoulders, creating a naturally broader, more athletic frame. Whether you're heading to a rooftop dinner or a weekend gallery visit, this is the piece that bridges the gap between casual comfort and understated sophistication.

title: Dusk & Sand Colorblock Knit Tee
description: Where modern minimalism meets artisanal warmth. Our Dusk & Sand Colorblock Knit Tee pairs a deep midnight navy with rich sand tones in a striking vertical panel design that's as considered as it is effortless. Every stitch is intentional â€” the tonal interplay between the two fabrics creates a visual depth that catches light differently as you move, making this far more than a simple colour-blocked piece. Knitted from a breathable long-staple cotton with a touch of silk for subtle sheen, it sits beautifully untucked over tailored trousers or dressed down with your favourite denim. This is slow fashion at its finest: a piece built to outlast trends and grow more characterful with every wear.
